Module yae.system

Provides many usefull methods for managing your current device.

Functions

getClipboardText () Gets text from the clipboard.
getOS () Get current platform.
getMemoryInfo () Get info about current memory usage
openURL (url) Opens a URL with the user's web or file browser.
setClipboardText (text) Puts text in the clipboard.
vibrate (seconds) Vibrates for the given amount of time.
quit () Terminate the application


Functions

getClipboardText ()
Gets text from the clipboard.

Returns:

    string The text currently held in the system's clipboard.

Usage:

    text = yae.system.getClipboardText!
getOS ()
Get current platform. Can return "desktop", "android", "ios" or "unknown"

Returns:

    string current platform

Usage:

    platform = yae.system.getOS!
getMemoryInfo ()
Get info about current memory usage

Returns:

    number memory heap

Usage:

    heap = yae.system.getMemoryInfo!
openURL (url)
Opens a URL with the user's web or file browser.

Parameters:

  • url string The URL to open. Must be formatted as a proper URL.

Returns:

    bool Whether the URL was opened successfully.

Usage:

    success = yae.system.openURL url
setClipboardText (text)
Puts text in the clipboard.

Parameters:

  • text string The new text to hold in the system's clipboard.

Usage:

    yae.system.setClipboardText text
vibrate (seconds)
Vibrates for the given amount of time.

Parameters:

  • seconds number the number of seconds to vibrate

Usage:

    yae.system.vibrate seconds
quit ()
Terminate the application

Usage:

    yae.system.quit! if something
